statements: SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance;
SELECT SalesID, SalesAmount FROM SalesPerformance WHERE Region='East';
SELECT SUM(SalesAmount) AS TotalSales FROM SalesPerformance WHERE ProductCategory='Electronics';
SELECT SalesID, Region, ProductCategory, SalesAmount, SalesDate FROM SalesPerformance ORDER BY SalesAmount DESC;
SELECT Region, ProductCategory, COUNT(*) AS TotalSalesCount FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY Region, ProductCategory;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance WHERE SalesAmount > 1000 AND Region = 'East' ORDER BY SalesDate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SalesID, Region FROM SalesPerformance WHERE ProductCategory = 'Electronics' ORDER BY Region, SalesAmount DESC;
SELECT SalesID, ProductCategory, SalesAmount FROM SalesPerformance WHERE SalesDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY SalesAmount ASC, Region;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance WHERE ProductCategory = 'Clothing' OR ProductCategory = 'Furniture' AND SalesAmount >= 500 ORDER BY ProductCategory, SalesAmount DESC;
SELECT Region, SUM(SalesAmount) AS TotalSales FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY Region HAVING SUM(SalesAmount) > 5000 ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_by_region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, sales_amount FROM sales_by_region WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name, sales_amount FROM sales_by_product_category ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT region_name, sales_amount FROM sales_by_region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales_by_product_category;
SELECT * FROM sales_by_region ORDER BY region_name DESC, sales_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT category_name, sales_amount FROM sales_by_product_category WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT region_id, region_name FROM sales_by_region WHERE sales_amount > 5000 ORDER BY region_id LIMIT 5
SELECT category_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_by_product_category GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT region_id, region_name, sales_amount FROM sales_by_region WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_id DESC, sales_amount LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SalesRegions;
SELECT region_name FROM SalesRegions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM ProductCategories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE region_id = 2 AND category_id = 3;
SELECT region_name, sale_amount FROM SalesRegions JOIN SalesData ON SalesRegions.region_id = SalesData.region_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE region_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY region_id
SELECT category_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM SalesData INNER JOIN ProductCategories ON SalesData.category_id = ProductCategories.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT DISTINCT region_id FROM SalesData
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales_performance;
SELECT region_name, product_category, sales_total FROM sales_performance WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM product_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT region_name, sales_total FROM sales_performance WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY sales_total DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region_id = 2 AND product_id = 3 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT region_name, product_category, sales_total FROM sales_performance ORDER BY sales_total DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE region_name = 'North';
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_performance GROUP BY region_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT region_name, product_category, sum(sales_total) AS total_sales FROM sales_performance GROUP BY region_name, product_category;

SELECT sales_data.sale_date, sales_data.sale_amount, product_data.product_name FROM sales_data INNER JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id WHERE sales_data.sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_data.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT target_id, target_amount, target_year FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount < 5000 ORDER BY target_year;
SELECT metric_id, performance_score, measurement_date FROM performance_metrics WHERE performance_score > 8.0 AND category_id = 'c3284515-5179-4a25-8484-af0615971318';
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT region_name, sale_amount, target_amount FROM regions INNER JOIN sales_targets ON regions.region_id = sales_targets.region_id WHERE target_amount > sale_amount;
SELECT region_name, performance_score, measurement_date FROM regions r JOIN performance_metrics p ON r.region_id = p.region_id ORDER BY performance_score DESC, measurement_date ASC;
